snippet.title: Making a SPEEDRUNNER for the BLACKTHORNPROD Game Jam! - BTP Jam 3
snippet.description:
Hey everyone! In this video, I show you the process of making a game jam entry for the BlackThornProd Game Jam hosted by Noa Calice's team on itch.io! My indie game is called MINIMA, and includes pixel art done in Aseprite, chiptune-like music composed in FL Studio, and the main game engine used is the Unity3D game engine! 

Play MINIMA in the browser here! https://icoso.itch.io/minima 
BTP Jam 3 Page - https://itch.io/jam/blackthornprod-game-jam-3 
Ben Bonk's Tutorial - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yaQlRvHgIvE&t=348s

Check out the new, revamped ICOSO DISCORD SERVER! https://discord.gg/pEBzR2Jk4F 

0:00 Introduction
0:34 Setting Up
1:06 Player Movement
1:25 Cinemachine
2:09 Gameplay Features
3:25 Room Making
3:50 Music
4:03 Room Making
4:27 Polish
5:27 Run of Game
7:51 End Card

I had heaps of fun as an indie game developer working on this project, and I hope to continue working on other game jam entries across this year! As hectic as it has been, game development, devlog making, and connecting with other indie devs has been a really great experience, and I hope to share that with you! :D

Music - Days like These by LAKEY INSPIRED https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RTGEoh-vPIc 

Check out my clothing designs! - https://teespring.com/stores/pixel-prints-icoso
I tweet sometimes lol - https://twitter.com/icoso_games
Join my Discord and hang with cool some cool people! - https://discord.gg/pEBzR2Jk4F 
Play my games on Itch.io! - https://icoso.itch.io/
I has Instagram, too! - https://www.instagram.com/icoso_games/
Feeling generous? Here's my Patreon page! - https://www.patreon.com/icoso
